days.text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist and fog in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
